cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: A well-structured content model is essential for creating scalable and flexible digital experiences. The Xperience by Kentico Content Modeling Certification validates your expertise in designing reusable, adaptable content structures while ensuring a smooth authoring experience. The exam tests both theoretical knowledge and practical skills—proving your ability to build effective content models that drive success.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Prove Your Expertise with the Xperience by Kentico Content Modeling Certification
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"76eff4ec-0bda-4e6e-aa38-65cc55be0b6c","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"e26685d6-a714-41ff-bec1-71670cc2271c","widgets":[{"identifier":"57041f74-ce86-4591-b270-2b68289f8d44","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"3b10f0df-b18b-496b-9580-320fd16c9f2c","properties":{"markdown":"Content modeling is more than just organizing data—it’s the foundation of creating seamless digital experiences. Whether you’re designing content models for websites, headless applications, or omnichannel experiences, a well-structured content model is your key to scalability, flexibility, and long-term success.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"54ccca1e-4960-4e11-b2ec-771922da40ea"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"55bd3312-645e-4688-b74f-2dba0e84ab44","markdownStyle":"7b93351d-5001-428d-91cd-6bceb274604d","markdownStyleParsed":"b3ebc373-8bcd-4323-944a-d04b4e38f782","markdownCodeLanguage":"afc3e98f-a68a-4101-a284-5e2933e8a7a0","id":"023ccd2b-23d1-40f5-926a-139babc1cfec"}}]},{"identifier":"6eaa4dd7-72f0-4615-8459-b3c6213aa482","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"77e1401d-a382-499a-b35c-ad7ba40114ae","properties":{"headingText":"Content modeling certification","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"ecf51583-1c02-48de-8b2f-254e7f80ee31"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"2e14f299-4808-4784-9d9b-96a4fd595628","headingLevel":"2b6687f9-468d-4980-aa41-755f5f3560a8","headingLevelsParsed":"e730c0fd-cb63-4e21-8a2e-6e5e88b31757","headingAlignment":"9e057a77-260a-428c-9ef9-8021cb580dee","headingAlignmentsParsed":"a7ab468c-16b0-4671-a302-a00a82dc44de","showHeadingAnchor":"0e09e29e-702b-4c8d-ac56-fc7a18f14601","id":"e0e937dc-3e74-4a76-8979-698c4fb9152e"}}]},{"identifier":"b8040301-39a5-4576-b976-c630165b7b2b","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"6d1efab5-9c8b-481d-ad2e-8117b24a3bd0","properties":{"markdown":"With the newly released **Xperience by Kentico Content modeling certification**, you can **prove your expertise, stand out in your field, and take your career to the next level**. This certification isn’t just about theory—it’s a validation of your real-world skills in creating effective, reusable, and adaptable content structures.

The **Content modeling certification** exam proves your expertise and demonstrates **real-world knowledge and hands-on experience**. To succeed, you need a deep understanding of user and business requirements, **Xperience by Kentico’s content modeling best practices**, and the ability to design content types that ensure a smooth authoring and content-curating experience. Understanding **Xperience’s data structures**, **taxonomy** options, and approaches to **display this data in different channels** is essential. Since the exam tests theoretical knowledge and practical skills, we highly recommend working on a real Xperience by Kentico project before attempting the test.

The certification exam is designed to be **accessible yet rigorous**. It consists of **50 single-answer questions** with a time limit of 75 minutes. The course contains sample questions to help you assess your readiness before taking the exam. Download the [exam preparation guide](https://asset.cloudinary.com/xperience-io/3382fab5ce10fbe3f76353db4f5280fd) for a detailed overview of the exam policies and requirements.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"778506f1-78ab-43ac-ae01-ef7ca5f1034d"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"55d57d24-7dda-4dca-8c39-1ef6e32cd1c0","markdownStyle":"32ea9f09-5bbe-4069-84d5-6310b2d7bc23","markdownStyleParsed":"1fdd7a92-b7cc-4259-b650-59867d60cdc0","markdownCodeLanguage":"10ad4bcd-67fa-493e-82f6-7c5da0185912","id":"b63f632a-ec16-4791-99fe-3a2295bb37b6"}}]},{"identifier":"d1d2d954-6547-4b04-b123-71d79bd6ce46","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2ad5cfd6-6840-4ddd-8ee7-ed03fcc94f77","properties":{"markdown":"Please contact [Kentico sales](https://www.kentico.com/how-to-buy/contact-sales) if you need to purchase a certification seat.
","markdownStyle":"Note","markdownStyleParsed":1,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"84658f7a-79f8-44ab-9f9e-bdaf8e346284"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"63454899-ef39-453a-9ea9-547d227bd3f5","markdownStyle":"95db4a0f-ea90-48ea-82bb-db3fefacea80","markdownStyleParsed":"8c7199ee-15b5-4fc3-b87b-ce316f3972fa","markdownCodeLanguage":"41c657ea-51ad-4b4d-8e41-a7ca4377ed99","id":"974022d2-ffd4-4570-8542-1726a36cbced"}}]},{"identifier":"cacbc3c8-1b05-4386-82fd-d4e13b793c5b","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"61d60b6a-d7ad-4070-92bc-0d981f7ef1f4","properties":{"markdown":"Earning the Xperience by Kentico Content modeling certification is more than just an achievement—it’s a way to showcase your expertise and stand out in content architecture. Ready to level up your skills? Register for the exam in the Training Portal and start your certification journey today!
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"cb6dd8c6-1158-4419-a4ba-dac24d4ca4d7"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"4a83dc3b-9025-4794-9c6d-e5aad5611a33","markdownStyle":"50ab7c75-9a49-42e3-9c48-cd8e0f8f683f","markdownStyleParsed":"2d4be500-7789-4cd6-9da8-af644f8f152e","markdownCodeLanguage":"47732ce1-500a-4b47-866f-4cee40af00aa","id":"14c3c498-b2e6-493b-aeb9-002c1a7b7ccc"}}]},{"identifier":"f0b70f41-4bcb-4442-abad-a28bdbd5cde9","type":"CommunityPortal.CtaButtonWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"c7476b84-95bc-4e95-8b98-f11e82a23303","properties":{"text":"Register today","linkURL":"https://training.kentico.com/plus/login","horizontalAlignment":"Center","horizontalAlignmentParsed":1,"id":"8608e992-9ee6-40c7-aa05-c23960e74849"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"text":"1b5bd8ba-7e0a-4de8-b513-24aa17216e30","linkURL":"616ec672-d9b8-43cf-9bad-b75b206e221a","horizontalAlignment":"8bffcdb7-eced-4389-95b3-2831025ca846","horizontalAlignmentParsed":"cfc73b38-9951-4375-aad2-e4970c8c3e9f","id":"db575c06-4d9c-43b3-9d97-922a877182d0"}}]}]}],"fieldIdentifiers":{"layout":"2459f497-b78e-4909-9187-2a60a33cb858","layoutParsed":"a631cdc7-35e5-440f-81e6-2833326d887a","paddingTop":"d3aa7fc9-4d8c-4bad-bb16-461a6d363600","paddingTopParsed":"5fce5a09-477a-437e-abb0-c2a379983661","paddingBottom":"9245d3e3-b99c-419e-8823-7c0393921ecb","paddingBottomParsed":"634c12d3-f931-4848-a951-728b4faed505","backgroundColor":"6b309d27-3a37-4ea7-a6e0-d270f2fe2951","backgroundColorParsed":"c7786524-acd9-44e0-9833-92cdc18b1b86"}}]}]}
cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: A well-structured content model is essential for creating scalable and flexible digital experiences. The Xperience by Kentico Content Modeling Certification validates your expertise in designing reusable, adaptable content structures while ensuring a smooth authoring experience. The exam tests both theoretical knowledge and practical skills—proving your ability to build effective content models that drive success.
